Shaping.title: Point Rummy
Shaping.decs: There are 13 cards played in point rummy, and 2-6 players can play with a single or double card deck.

Shaping.title: Pool Rummy
Shaping.decs: In the Pool Rummy Game, the gaming software offers 101 & 201 pool games.

Shaping.title: Deal Rummy
Shaping.decs: The Deal Rummy game is configured with multiple deals with different entry fees.

Shaping.title: Canasta
Shaping.decs: It means basket and is a Spanish kind of game that has different variations and is played in a group.

Shaping.title: 13 Rummy Card
Shaping.decs: It is a game of 2 to 6 players in which each player is dealt 13 cards.

Shaping.title: Rummikub
Shaping.decs: It is very popular in Europe and America for 2-4 players with tiles instead of cards.
